text: Wonder Woman is being praised as one of the best superhero films ever. And it seems Lupita Nyong'o wholeheartedly agrees, as the 12 Years a Slave actress took to Instagram on Friday to rave about the movie. The 34 - year - old couldn't say enough good things in her caption, which accompanied a promotional picture of Gal Gadot as the titular star. Biggest fan! It seems Lupita Nyong'o absolutely loved Wonder Woman, as the 12 Years a Slave actress took to Instagram on Friday to rave about the movie'Ok people, I just left the theater and KNOW for CERTAIN that the GODS have seen fit to BLESS us with # WonderWoman,'began the Star Wars actress
